item.title: Title Lint
item.description: Title Lint Title Lint ensures all Pull Request titles follow a similar pattern. This application is useful if you follow standards such as conventional commit or as part of your change managegment process to ensure Pull Requests are linked back to your work management tool (i.e. Jira). Configuration parameter description required regex The regular expression to test Pull Request titles agains yes Example Configuration # githaxs_settings/ghx.
